actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish a Working Capital Fund in the Department of Justice.

summary.text: Establishes a working capital fund for the Department of Justice, which shall be available, without fiscal year limitation, for expenses and equipment necessary for maintenance and operation of such administrative services as the Attorney General determines may be performed more advantageously as central services. Authorizes appropriations of such amounts as may be necessary to provide capital for the fund.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Working Capital Fund in the Department of Justice.
